concepts.label: Public Safety
concepts.description: The paramount obligation of engineers to prioritize public safety, health, and welfare
text_references: Hold paramount the safety, health, and welfare of the public

concepts.label: Professional Competence
concepts.description: Engineers must only practice in areas of their professional competence
text_references: Perform services only in areas of their competence

concepts.label: Honesty in Communication
concepts.description: Engineers must communicate truthfully and objectively in public statements
text_references: Issue public statements only in an objective and truthful manner
